name: "Psych" You Out in the End Part 1 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the pilot episode of "Psych", when Shawn Spencer told the chief of police in Santa Barbara that he was actually a psychic, was he telling the truth?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Shawn's dad, Henry Spencer, was a police officer and taught him how to be observant. Shawn used this lie to get a job working at the police department and opening his own detective agency comically called Psych. He is hyper observant which was mentioned by a student in the episode, "If You're So Smart, Then Why Are You Dead?"

questions.text: Shawn Spencer's mother was introduced in the third season opener, "Ghost". What eighties bombshell played her?
questions.explanation:
Cybill Shepherd.

	Cybill Shepherd played Doctor Madeleine Spencer, a psychiatrist that works with police departments. Madeleine showed up in town and revealed to Shawn that she wanted the divorce and not Henry.

questions.text: Who played the parents of Burton Guster on "Gus' Dad May Have Killed An Old Guy"?
questions.explanation:
Phylicia Rashad and Ernie Hudson.

	Gus' parents were first seen in this episode which was also the first Christmas episode for "Psych". When Gus' parents were accused of killing a neighbor no one liked, Shawn and Gus helped clear them of the neighbor's murder.

questions.text: In "Scary Sherry: Bianca's Toast", where were Gus and Shawn when Gus was referred to as Bud from "The Cosby Show"?
questions.explanation:
Sorority house.

	When Gus heard the reference to Bud, he and Shawn were in a sorority house doing a psychic reading for Juliet while she was undercover. One of the sorority girls asked Gus if he was indeed Bud from "The Cosby Show". Gus realized Shawn had started telling people that lie again.

questions.text: Where did Gus and Shawn first see art thief, Pierre Despereaux, in "Extradition: British Columbia"?
questions.explanation:
On the ski slope.

	Shawn took he and Gus on a ski trip to British Columbia on Gus' dime. While on the ski slope, Shawn saw Pierre Despereaux who he recognized from Lassiter's criminal photographs. Lassiter and Juliet went to meet Gus and Shawn in British Columbia where Shawn finally caught Despereaux, much to Lassiter's chagrin.

questions.text: Season two had an episode with the theme song being performed in what language for the episode "Lights, Camera, Homicido"?
questions.explanation:
Spanish.

	"Lights, Camera, Homicido" was the first time the theme song for "Psych" was performed in a different language. Steve Franks wrote the theme song titled "I Know You Know" and Steve's band, the Friendly Indians, performed it. The Spanish version of the "Psych" theme song is used for a second time in season seven.

questions.text: How did Juliet learn of Shawn's true feelings for her in "One, Maybe Two Ways Out"?
questions.correct: Juliet heard Shawn telling Gus about Juliet while he was wearing a wire
options: Shawn went through Gus to tell Juliet how he felt about her
Juliet was behind Shawn while he was talking to Gus
Shawn went to Juliet's apartment and told her how he felt
questions.explanation:
Juliet heard Shawn telling Gus about Juliet while he was wearing a wire.

	The FBI wired Shawn while he was talking to a Russian spy named Nadia so they could get information from her for an arrest. After Nadia was arrested, Shawn had forgotten he was wired while he was telling Gus his true feelings for Juliet. Still back at the surveillance van, Juliet heard everything Shawn was saying to Gus.

questions.text: Why was Shawn singled out by a serial killer in an "Evening with Mr. Yang"?
questions.correct: Shawn was found a worthy opponent by Mr. Yang
options: Shawn saved a victim of Mr. Yang
Shawn unknowingly saved Mr. Yang's life
Shawn identified himself as a serial killer groupie
questions.explanation:
Shawn was found a worthy opponent by Mr. Yang

	To Mr. Yang, Shawn was found out to be a worthy opponent and that's why Mr. Yang chose him to go after. When Shawn acted as if he refused to play along, Mr. Yang kidnapped Shawn's mother so that Shawn would play along. In "Yang 3 in 2D", it is revealed that Shawn met Mr. Yang when he was a boy and they had their picture taken together by Shawn's mother, Madeleine.

questions.text: During the 1985 Spelling Bee, Gus gave Shawn the wrong letter for a word he was spelling causing him to lose the spelling bee.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Shawn gave Gus the wrong letter telling Gus later that he did it for Gus' own good. If Gus had spelled the word correctly, he would have won the spelling bee.

questions.text: What was the name of the superhero who was catching criminals before Shawn and the others could arrive in "The Amazing Psych-Man & Tap Man, Issue 2"?
questions.explanation:
The Mantis.

	The Mantis was actually a news reporter named Reginald Parker who had a black belt in karate. He passed himself off as a good guy until Shawn realized he stole drug money from the criminals for himself.
